title: Characterization of bacterial diversity in rhizospheric soils, irrigation water, and lettuce crops in municipalities near the Bogotá river, Colombia
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Rodrigo A. Echeverry-Gallego, Diana Martínez-Pachón, Nelson Enrique Arenas, Diego C Franco, Alejandro Moncayo-Lasso, Javier Vanegas
